title: Grade 9 student ‘abducted, raped’ in Wah - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
TAXILA: Police on Thursday booked three persons for allegedly abducting a grade 9 student, sexually assaulting her and filming her naked in the Ghreebabad area within the limits of Wah Cantonment police station.

The victim’s father reported to police that his 13-year-old daughter was returning home after attending a religious studies class when three teenage boys allegedly dragged her into a house where they sexually assaulted her and filmed her naked.

Published in Dawn, August 22th, 2025
